mapper.select: SELECT name,id from jockey where id = #{id};

SELECT name,id from jockey where name collate utf8mb4_bin in
#{name}

SELECT avg(ranking) FROM race JOIN raceResult ON race.id = raceResult.raceId JOIN raceHorse ON race.id = raceHorse.raceId AND raceResult.frameNumber = raceHorse.frameNumber join jockey on jockey.id = raceHorse.jockeyId where jockey.id = #{id} AND stadium = #{stadium} AND raceLength = #{raceLength} AND raceType = #{raceType} AND raceDate >= #{raceDate} group by jockeyId,stadium,raceLength having count(ranking) > 10;
